    Published in Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B, 2024

    Recommended citation: Jie Li, Paul Fearnhead, Piotr Fryzlewicz and Tengyao Wang (2024). Authors’ reply to the Discussion of ‘Automatic Change-Point Detection in Time Series via Deep Learning’ at the Discussion Meeting on ‘Probabilistic and statistical aspects of machine learning’. Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B: Statistical Methodology, Volume 86, Issue 2, April 2024, Pages 332–334, https://doi.org/10.1093/jrsssb/qkae008.
